title: Newcastle 2-1 Brentford: Did you know?
title_page: Newcastle 2-1 Brentford: Did you know? - BBC Sport
maintext: Jacob Murphy (seven assists) and Alexander Isak (one assist) have combined for eight Premier League goals this season - more than any other duo. While only Andrew Cole and Peter Beardsley have ever combined for more goals in a single campaign in the competition for Newcastle (nine in 1993-94).
